Parameters: MediaRecorder: the MediaRecorder that encountered the error
int: the type of error that has occurred: MediaRecorder.MEDIA_RECORDER_ERROR_UNKNOWN MediaRecorder.MEDIA_ERROR_SERVER_DIED
int: an extra code, specific to the error type
